sentences.en: A hyphen is an acceptable alternative to a comma.
sentences.cn: 连字符可以接受用来替代逗号.

sentences.en: Because she included the hyphen (-), nothing else is required; because 1=1 is always true, she will be able to log in successfully.
sentences.cn: 由于她包含了连字号（-），所以任何其他东西都不需要；由于 1=1 总是为真，所以她将能够成功登录。

sentences.en: Discretionary hyphen: Hyphen inserted by keyboard and which overrides the hyphenation program in use.
sentences.cn: 决断式连字: 用键盘加上连字号的情况,它可以取代连字程式所用的连字法.

sentences.en: Shall we put a comma, a question mark, a semi - colon or a hyphen here?
sentences.cn: 这儿该用逗号 、 问号、破折号 、 分号还是连字符号?

sentences.en: Stump line: The last line of a page ending with a hyphen . Consider undesirable.
sentences.cn: 断行: 英文排字的不善情况. 指在书页的最后一行,要作分字.

sentences.en: The dash is longer than the hyphen.
sentences.cn: 破折号比连字符稍长点.

sentences.en: The following expressions match all lowercase letters and the hyphen.
sentences.cn: 下面的表达式匹配所有小写字母和连字符.

sentences.en: This is actually three bits of information , joined together by a double hyphen.
sentences.cn: 这实际上是用双划线组成的三块信息.

sentences.en: Those two words need to be connected a hyphen.
sentences.cn: 那两个字要用连字符号连起来.

sentences.en: To divide or connect ( syllables, word elements , or names ) a hyphen.
sentences.cn: ( 关于词语 ) 用连字符的方法组合的.

sentences.en: To divide or connect ( syllables, word elements, or names ) with a hyphen.
sentences.cn: 以连字号连接用连字号分离或连接 ( 音节 、 词素或名字 )

sentences.en: Used to take the place of hyphen in many occasions when finer typography is required.
sentences.cn: 很多时,配合精细的排字要求,就用它来代替连字号.

sentences.en: When you described depression as a "disease" you might have spelled the word with a hyphen.
sentences.cn: 当你形容为“疾病”你可能有一个连字符的拼写单词抑郁症。

words.tran_cn: 用连字符连接（hyphenate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a short written or printed line (-) that joins words or  syllables
